message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,000,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $600,000. I believe that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, the value of this product is significantly higher than your offer. I'm willing to come down to $900,000. This is a generous offer considering its true worth.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $900,000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $750,000 for the product. I believe that's a fair price considering its value to me.
